name: NATIONAL COMMUNITY PHARMACISTS ASSOCIATION (NCPA)
sampleDescriptions: Legislative and regulatory issues related to independent pharmacists.
Legislative and regulatory issues related to coronavirus response efforts.
Legislative and regulatory issues related to independent pharmacists. PBM Issues, including S.2973 - Modernizing and Ensuring PBM Accountability Act. H.R.5378 - Lower Costs, More Transparency Act.
Monitoring legislative and regulatory issues related to pharmacies. Medicaid prescription drug reimbursement.
